title: Marie Curie
subtle:
Biography (nonfiction), 1,338 words, Level V (Grade 4), Lexile 1000L

description: The work of Marie Curie revolutionized scientific understanding of the nature of atoms and opened up new frontiers in medicine. Marie Curie is a detailed account of this remarkable woman's legacy in the face of discrimination and struggle. The book can be used to teach students the elements of a biography. The book and lesson are also available for levels Y and Z1.
